1320300.name: The Cubedex of Brass and Wood Demo
1320300.description:
The Cubedex of Brass and Wood is a puzzle game consisting of five mysterious electromechanical devices linked by the Cubedex itself. Like puzzle hunts and escape rooms, sometimes the goal is obvious but the solution is challenging; and sometimes figuring out the goal is itself part of the puzzle.

The demo contains special versions of two of the puzzles, connected by a (not-in-the-full-game) meta-puzzle.
